scenario.title: Account Closure Request
scenario.description: Customer wants to close their National Bonds account

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.message: Hello, I've been thinking about this for a while and I'd like to close my National Bonds account today. I'm just not happy with the returns.

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.expected_response: I understand your concern about the returns. I'd be happy to help you explore your options. May I ask what specific aspects of the returns you're concerned about?

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.message: Well, I've had the account for two years and the returns seem lower than what I expected when I signed up. I thought I'd be earning more by now.

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.expected_response: I can understand your frustration. Let me take a look at your account to better understand your situation. The Mudaraba returns can vary based on market conditions, but I'd like to review your specific case.

scenario.title: Customer Retention - Basic
scenario.description: Practice retaining customers who express dissatisfaction

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.message: Hi, I'm calling because I'm not very satisfied with my National Bonds experience. I'm considering switching to another provider.

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.expected_response: I'm sorry to hear you're not satisfied with your experience. I'd really like to understand what's been concerning you so we can work together to address it.

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.message: It's mainly the customer service. When I call, I often have to wait a long time, and sometimes I don't feel like my questions are properly answered.

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.expected_response: I sincerely apologize for those experiences. Long wait times and incomplete answers are definitely not the service standard we aim for. Thank you for bringing this to my attention - it helps us improve.

scenario.title: Mudaraba Product Explanation
scenario.description: Explain Shari'a-compliant saving products to interested customers

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.message: Hello, I've heard about National Bonds and I'm interested in learning more. Can you explain how your Shari'a-compliant savings work?

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.expected_response: I'd be happy to explain our Mudaraba-based savings scheme. It's designed to be fully Shari'a-compliant, which means your money is invested according to Islamic principles without any interest-based returns.

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.message: That sounds interesting. How exactly does the Mudaraba system work? I want to make sure I understand it properly.

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.expected_response: Great question! In our Mudaraba system, you provide the capital and we act as the manager, investing your funds in Shari'a-compliant business activities. Any profits generated are shared between you and National Bonds according to a pre-agreed ratio.
